languages.text: Новый порядок Футфола, пусть и не такой жесткий, как диктатура Чорда, придал станции хотя бы видимость законопослушной имперской колонии. Спустя годы гонений криминальные бароны осознали, что проще делать троны на службе, чем на грабеже, и превратились в предводителей отрядов стражи и чиновников. Кровожадность и алчность их от этого лишь возросли.
languages.translation_comment: Повелели изменить жизнь на Футфоле в фейт

languages.text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.
languages.original_text: Новый порядок Футфола, пусть и не такой жесткий, как диктатура Чорда, придал станции хотя бы видимость законопослушной имперской колонии. Спустя годы гонений криминальные бароны осознали, что проще делать троны на службе, чем на грабеже, и превратились в предводителей отрядов стражи и чиновников. Кровожадность и алчность их от этого лишь возросли.

traits.locale_text: The new order on the Footfall was not as harsh, as Chorda's dictatorship, though it still managed to give the station an appearance of a lawful Imperium colony. After years of persecution, criminal lords recognised that it was more profitable to make thrones in the office than on a metaphorical roadside. They took the roles of the leaders of the guard and government officials. Their thirst for blood and greed only increased with this shift.

The new order on the Footfall was not as harsh, as Chorda's dictatorship, though it still managed to give the station an appearance of a lawful Imperium colony. After years of persecution, criminal lords recognised that it was more profitable to make thrones in the office than on a metaphorical roadside. They took the roles of the leaders of the guard and government officials. Their thirst for blood and greed only increased with this shift.

The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally and became leaders in the government and law enforcement. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally and became leaders in the government and law enforcement. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

languages.text: 落脚港的新政权没有库尔达的独裁统治那么严厉，而这座星站也变得更像是帝国的合法殖民地。犯罪头目们忍受了多年的打压之后，意识到通过合法手段来赚钱更加有利可图，于是他们纷纷摇身一变，成为了政府人员与执法部门的高层人士，而这样的变化只会让他们更加贪婪、更加嗜血。
languages.original_text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港的新政权没有库尔达的独裁统治那么严厉，但这至少让这座星站看起来更像是帝国的合法殖民地。犯罪头目们忍受了多年的打压之后，意识到通过法律手段来赚钱更加有利可图，于是他们纷纷摇身一变，成为了政府人员与执法部门的高层，而这样的变化只会让他们更加贪婪、更加嗜血。

languages.text: Das neue Regime auf Footfall war weniger brutal als Chordas Diktatur, doch auch ihm gelang es, der Station den Anschein zu verleihen, eine gesetzestreue Kolonie des Imperiums zu sein. Nach Jahren der Verfolgung erkannten die Verbrecherbosse, dass es profitabler war, Thronmünzen legal zu verdienen, und so sicherten sie sich hochrangige Positionen unter den Wächtern und Bürokraten der Station. Dieser Wechsel der Seiten verstärkte ihre Gier und ihre Blutrünstigkeit jedoch nur noch.
languages.original_text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

traits.locale_text: Das neue Regime auf Footfall war weniger brutal als Chordas Diktatur, doch auch ihm gelang es, der Station den Anschein zu verleihen, eine gesetzestreue Kolonie des Imperiums zu sein. Nach Jahren der Verfolgung erkannten Verbrecherbosse, dass es profitabler war, auf legale Weise Thronmünzen zu verdienen. So nahmen sie führende Posten in der Regierung und Strafverfolgung an. Dieser Wechsel der Seiten verstärkte ihre Gier und ihre Blutrünstigkeit jedoch nur noch.

languages.text: Même si le nouveau régime de Castel était moins sévère que la dictature de Chorda, il régnait dans la station une atmosphère de colonie légale de l'Imperium. Après des années de persécution, les barons du crime réalisèrent qu'il était plus rentable de gagner des trônes légalement. Ainsi, ils s'installèrent à des postes haut placés parmi les gardiens et les bureaucrates de la station, mais ce changement ne fit qu'attiser leur avidité et leur soif de sang.
languages.original_text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

traits.locale_text: Même si le nouveau régime de Castel était moins sévère que la dictature de Chorda, il régnait dans la station une atmosphère de colonie légale de l'Imperium. Après des années de persécution, les barons du crime réalisèrent qu'il était plus rentable de gagner des trônes légalement. Ainsi, ils s'installèrent à des postes haut placés parmi les gardiens et les bureaucrates de la station, mais ce changement ne fit qu'attiser leur avidité et leur soif de sang.

languages.text: El nuevo régimen de Paso era más permisible que la dictadura de Chorda, pero aun así consiguió dar a la estación el aspecto de una colonia legítima del Imperium. Tras años de persecución, los líderes criminales comprendieron que era más rentable ganarse los tronos legalmente, por lo que comenzaron a acceder a puestos altos del gobierno y de las fuerzas del orden. Esto, sin embargo, no hizo más que aumentar su codicia y su sed de sangre.
languages.original_text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

traits.locale_text: El nuevo régimen de Paso era más permisible que la dictadura de Chorda, pero aun así consiguió dar a la estación el aspecto de una colonia legítima del Imperium. Tras años de persecución, los líderes criminales comprendieron que era más rentable ganarse los tronos legalmente y acceder a puestos del gobierno y de las fuerzas del orden, aunque el cambio no hizo más que aumentar su codicia y su sed de sangre.

languages.text: フットフォールの新体制は、チョーダの独裁政権よりは苛酷ではなかったが、それでもステーションに帝国の合法的な植民地のような外観を与えることに成功した。長年にもわたる迫害の末、犯罪王たちは合法的に王座を築いたほうが儲かることに気づき、ステーションの所長や役員の中で自分たちの地位を高めていった。しかし、この変化は彼らの貪欲さと血への渇きを増長させただけだった。
languages.original_text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールの新政権は、チョーダの独裁政権よりは苛酷ではなかったが、それでもステーションに帝国の合法的な植民地のような外観を与えることに成功した。長年の迫害の末、犯罪王たちは合法的に王座を築いたほうが儲かることに気づき、政府や法執行機関の指導者となった。しかし、この変化は彼らの貪欲さと血への渇きを増長させただけだった。

languages.text: Binliman'daki yeni rejim, Chorda'nın diktatörlüğünden daha az sertti ancak yine de istasyona, İmparatorluk kanunlarına uyulan bir koloni görünümü kazandırmaya yetti. Yıllarca süren zulmün ardından suç baronları, geltlerini yasal yollarla elde etmenin daha kârlı olacağını fark ettiler ve kendilerini, istasyonun yöneticilerinin ve bürokratların yanında üst düzey mevkilere getirttiler. Ancak bu değişim yalnızca açgözlülüklerini ve kana susamışlıklarını artırmaya yaradı.
languages.original_text: The new regime on Footfall was less harsh than Chorda's dictatorship, but it still managed to give the station the appearance of a lawful colony of the Imperium. After years of persecution, the crime lords realised that it was more profitable to make thrones legally, and so they installed themselves in high-ranking positions among the station's wardens and bureaucrats. But this change only increased their greed and thirst for blood.

traits.locale_text: Binliman'daki yeni rejim, Chorda'nın diktatörlüğünden daha az sertti ancak yine de istasyona, İmparatorluk kanunlarına uyulan bir koloni görünümü kazandırmaya yetti. Yıllarca süren zulmün ardından suç baronları, geltlerini yasal yollarla elde etmenin daha kârlı olacağını fark ettiler ve kendilerini, istasyonun yöneticilerinin ve bürokratların yanında üst düzey mevkilere getirttiler. Ancak bu değişim yalnızca açgözlülüklerini ve kana susamışlıklarını artırmaya yaradı.

languages.translation_comment: Повелели изменить жизнь на Футфоле в фейт
